body.name: Black & Decker Crisp 'N Bake Air Fryer Toaster Oven
features: Air Fry Technology - Deep fried taste without the fat! This innovative cooking method surrounds food with high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite foods using little to no oil.
Choose from 5 available cooking methods: bake, broil, toast, keep warm, and air fry.
This large capacity toaster oven fits 6 slices of bread or a 12” pizza.
The 60-minute precision timer features stay-on functionality for long baking tasks.
The Bake function lets you make pizzas, frozen snacks, and so much more! It’s great for reheating leftovers without turning on the big oven.
body.description: Introducing Air Fry Technology, new in the BLACK+DECKER Crisp 'N Bake Air Fry Toaster Oven. This is deep fried taste without the fat! Air Fry Technology uses high intensity hot air to bake, brown, and crisp your favorite fried foods with little to no oil giving you the same lovely taste. Try French fries, veggie chips, breaded fish filets, frozen snacks, and a lot more! Perfect for a family of 6 since there’s space for up to 6 slices of bread or a 12” pizza. Three control knobs make it easy to set the toast timer, 60-minute timer, and choose from 5 cooking functions: bake, broil, toast, keep warm, and air fry. Convection technology circulates air within the oven for fast and even results when air frying. Plus, this toaster oven includes an air fry basket so you don't have to flip the food half way through the cycle for an even cook, bake/broil pan and rack, and an external crumb tray that slides in and out to make cleanup a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent countertop oven
reviews.reviewText: I bought this oven to replace a different no name brand oven that died after only about 4 years so I decided to get a well-known brand - I expect this oven to last a lot longer. It arrived a few days ahead of schedule. It seems to work very well - cooked a turkey dog from completely frozen to done in less than 8 minutes. Air fry mode worked great when I made some french fries.The dials seem straightforward though I’m still getting used to them. Very pleased with this purchase plus the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Worth the Money
reviews.reviewText: I was curious about how well this product worked after reading the reviews, especially the negative ones, and I always follow the reviews from other people before buying stuff on Amazon, Overall I’m satisfied so I don’t understand the negatives at all, it seems to do the job pretty well. It bakes, makes toast and can be used as an air fryer so I far I’ve used all the features and it’s holding up well. I guess I well need to allow some time to see if any issues pop up but for the money it’s a great deal and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My toaster oven went out
reviews.reviewText: My toaster oven has went out and this one is smaller and I don’t think I can cook as much in it , it will have to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toaster oven airfryer
reviews.reviewText: Always bought Cuisinart. Decided to give this one a chance. Really nice appliance. Simple to use settings, love the airfryer feature. Easy to clean, and wether it’s used on toaster, oven or airfryer setting it cools down so quick. Looks great on my countertop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price & value.
reviews.reviewText: All in all, it's a great toaster oven/air-fryer. but the glass door is fragile feeling & the spring return can let it bang closed.Carefully closing it is advised.Bought it mainly to cook 12" frozen pizzas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer, Oven and Toaster
reviews.reviewText: This is great for air frying and for oven. Hardly have to use my big oven. This is a very reasonable price as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: This toaster oven is big enough for a large casserole dish yet small enough to take up no more space on my counter than my older, smaller one. It has three oven rack levels which I find very convenient. The outside gets hot but the warning is clear and it IS a toaster. At this point I am satisfied. I haven't tried the air frier option but that is not why I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So, obviously, this brand is known for its excellent quality appliances. Knowing that, I almost feel bad criticizing this product at all. It's overall really great. However, there are a couple things I don't like.First, there are hot and cold spots inside the oven. The left side gets food more brown and crispy than the right side. That is really irritating for a product that is supposed to be really high quality. Also, the air fry setting and the bake setting are basically the same. There's not any way to activate the "air frying" setting at a lower temperature than the absolute max. Yet the instructions indicate various temperatures that can be used when air frying. If I set it lower than the max setting, it is on the bake setting and not the air fryer setting. The two sound very different so it is obvious. I'm not sure what the deal is with that.Everything else about this is great, though. The toaster works, the timer works, it is easy to clean, and it is one of my go-to kitchen appliances for everything from heating up chicken nuggets to cooking sausages and bacon. I think it seems more like a really fancy and big toaster oven than a real air fryer, though.
Item came quickly, easy to assemble and wash the trays. Room mate enjoys said toaster oven and I enjoy the fryer. Worth it.
I've only tried the air fryer setting twice and found the fries to be much like putting them on a cookie sheet in a regular oven.
I absolutely love my new toaster oven and air fryer. I use it every day for everything. It is one of the best products I've ever bought. I am so happy with it
I was looking for something that has air fryer with low wattage. This is it! It works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: The appliance is perfect to cook pizza and small meals.
reviews.reviewText: So fast I have only use the air Flyer oven to cook pizza. The oven is easy to use and it aim that hot but enough to cook pizza.
